title: Suburban Underbelly
description: "Play date" is about to take on a whole new meaning . . .For suburban moms Quinn, Jill, and Lucy, freedom from motherhood as a competitive sport starts innocently enough: three hours a week without kids. And what could be the harm in indulging a fantasy or two? Before they know it, things are careening way out of control.Sexy, snarky, smart, and laugh-out-loud funny, SUBURBAN UNDERBELLY takes you on the ride of a lifetime with the best friends we all wish we had.Alternate cover edition - ASIN B00ED0JEJG.
author: Michele Theron
